title: Update landing page content for a jewellery use case

requirements.text: Update the landing page (header/hero/sections) copy and content so the app is clearly positioned for a jewellery-related use case, while keeping the app name “Arunodaya”. All user-facing text must be in English.

quotes: Ok mujhe juwalry kw liya chaiya

acceptanceCriteria: The hero headline/subheadline mention jewellery (e.g., fine jewellery, handcrafted jewellery, designs, craftsmanship) instead of generic tech/sunrise messaging.

The “Something Amazing is Coming” section is rewritten to describe upcoming jewellery-related features/services (e.g., new collections, custom orders, certifications/craftsmanship, appointments), without adding real e-commerce functionality.
Navigation and CTA button labels are updated to match a jewellery context (e.g., “Browse Collection”, “Book Appointment”, “Get Updates”), and their anchor targets still work on the page.
No blue/purple primary palette is introduced; styling remains consistent with the existing theme system.

requirements.text: Update site metadata text to match the jewellery positioning (e.g., the HTML meta description) while keeping the title as “Arunodaya”. All user-facing text must be in English.

quotes: Ok mujhe juwalry kw liya chaiya

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/index.html` meta description no longer describes a generic “new dawn” message and instead describes Arunodaya as a jewellery-focused brand/app.

requirements.text: Replace non-jewellery visual cues used in the landing page content (e.g., icons used in feature cards/badges) with jewellery-appropriate icons, while keeping the overall layout coherent.

quotes: Ok mujhe juwalry kw liya chaiya

acceptanceCriteria: Hero badge/feature-card icons are updated to jewellery-relevant symbols (e.g., gem/diamond/ring) and still render correctly.
No broken imports or missing icon renderings occur in the landing page.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, `frontend/src/components/ui`.
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor; no new backend canisters/services.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Building a full jewellery e-commerce system (products, cart, checkout, payments).
Inventory management, order management, shipping, or tax calculation.
Adding third-party authentication providers (only Internet Identity is supported).

edits: Add subtle jewellery motifs while keeping the existing brand style (arunodaya-logo.dim_512x512.png > arunodaya-logo-jewellery.dim_512x512.png)
Make the app icon read as jewellery-themed at small sizes (arunodaya-icon.dim_256x256.png > arunodaya-icon-jewellery.dim_256x256.png)
Shift the hero background from abstract sunrise to an elegant jewellery-themed background (arunodaya-hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png > arunodaya-hero-bg-jewellery.dim_1920x1080.png)
